about_the_game:
Creating games set in a post apocalyptic wasteland or dystopian future? This asset pack contains over 250 HUD custom-made images by Mattpainting.be, allowing you to design excellent, modern looking in-game HUD's using the GameGuru MAX HUD editor.

Create menus, game HUD's, decorate your storyboard screens and much more.

Included in this asset pack, you'll find images allowing you to build impressive front-end screens, including health and ammo panels, weapon displays, inventory and quest screens and much more.
detailed_description:
Creating games set in a post apocalyptic wasteland or dystopian future? This asset pack contains over 250 HUD custom-made images by Mattpainting.be, allowing you to design excellent, modern looking in-game HUD's using the GameGuru MAX HUD editor.

Create menus, game HUD's, decorate your storyboard screens and much more.

Included in this asset pack, you'll find images allowing you to build impressive front-end screens, including health and ammo panels, weapon displays, inventory and quest screens and much more.
name: GameGuru MAX Wasteland Asset Pack - HUD's Volume 1

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or newer (64-bit versions only)
  • Processor: Intel Dual-Core 2GHz or AMD Dual-Core 2GHz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 | AMD Radeon R9 Fury, with 4 GB VRAM, or better
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card with latest drivers
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or newer (64-bit versions only)
  • Processor: Intel i7-9700K | AMD 3700X, or better.
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2070 | Radeon 5700 XT, with 8 GB VRAM, or better
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card with latest drivers

short_description: Creating games set in a post apocalyptic wasteland or dystopian future? This asset pack contains over 250 HUD custom-made images, allowing you to design numerous game front-end screens.
